sources.name: TestStreamingData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TestStreamingData

sinks.name: FinalTestStreamingData
sinks.script:
TestStreamingData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> FinalTestStreamingData
